add_by_ip.title: Manually add
add_by_ip.no_new_devices_hint: All found TVs are already added. Try to add your TV manually.
add_by_ip.click_here_documentation: Click here to view the documentation.

authenticate.intro: Enter the code displayed on the TV

verify.verified: Wake-on-LAN is enabled and working correctly!
verify.errorDescription:
The on/off behavior of the TV may not work as expected if Wake-on-LAN is not enabled.
When your TV is put in standby mode, you can control it for about 10 minutes before it is fully turned off. Without Wake-on-LAN, there is no way to turn your TV back on after this.

error.pairing_timeout: The pairing session has expired, please try again.
error.endpoint_not_found: The TV can be reached but something seems to have gone wrong in determining the Jointspace version. Try adding your TV manually.
error.host_unreachable: Could not reach the TV at this IP address. Check the IP address and make sure the TV is on.
error.connection_timed_out:
A timeout occurred while connecting to your TV.

Try adding your TV again. If this fails again, try restarting your TV completely or add it manually.
error.could_not_start_pairing: Something went wrong while starting the pairing request.
error.pairing_not_found:
Could not start pairing request because the TV indicates that it does not exist. Your TV may not require authentication or it may not be supported by this app.

Try adding your TV manually without authentication.
error.concurrent_pairing: A pairing request has already been started, please wait 60 seconds and try again.
